In addition, the PCs also find a ledger detailing many Scarlet Triad transactions. With a successful @Check[type:guild-lore|dc:28] or a @Check[type:society|dc:35] check, a PC paging through the ledger determines that the Scarlet Triad has been dodging taxes, undercutting competition, and attempting to accumulate a lot of money very quickly-all in ways that quietly harm the Fleshmonger Federation, Aspis Consortium, and church of Abadar. Once for each guild, a PC can use the ledger when Influencing a Guild to reduce that organization's Support Points by an additional 2 points. The second time the PCs complete this Opportunity, they recover a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.K2rMmiBlzcysNuj6]{Belt of Regeneration}, as well as an alabaster-and-silver amphoriskos perfume bottle within which is bound the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.GyigGu36XLPV72nW]{Djinni} vizier Palqari the Wise. The Scarlet Triad trapped Palqari and offered him freedom in exchange for three wishes. Uri Zandivar already used two of these wishes to assist with the repair of the Orb of Gold Dragonkind, but then refrained from redeeming his last wish. Palqari is amenable to granting this last wish to the PCs if they help him escape; until then, he can't travel more than 20 feet from his amphoriskos, nor can he move it himself. This wish can be used to automatically rescue all of the slaves, but the PCs will still need to escape on their own. Although Palqari is eager to return to the Plane of Air, he could become a recurring ally later in the adventure at your discretion.

Критический провал: The PCs are noticed by a group of guards. At the end of every round of combat, Awareness increases by 1.

Make General Repairs.name: Make General Repairs
Make General Repairs.description:
Требования: Crafting (trained), Specialty Crafting (woodworking), or hired woodworker; organized workers

You make general repairs to the citadel furnishings, replacing or fixing furniture, replacing rotted floorboards, and rehanging doors throughout the structure. This task takes 14 days of work and a @Check[type:crafting|dc:15] check.

Mental Ward.name: Mental Ward
Mental Ward.description:
Частота: once

Триггер: You fail or critically fail a saving throw against a mental effect

Эффект: You're unaffected by the triggering effect.

Navigate Steamgrotto.name: Навигация по Паровому гроту
Navigate Steamgrotto.description:
Вы проводите время, наблюдая за закономерностями извержений гейзеров в Паровом гроте, а затем как можно лучше планируете свои передвижения по региону, чтобы не подвергать себя опасности. Вы можете попытаться пройти по Паровому гроту, используя Природу, Восприятие или Выживание и совершив успешную проверку КС 35, но использование Восприятия не дает вам более глубокого понимания природы опасности, и в результате вы получаете штраф обстоятельства -4.

Критический успех: Вы избегаете опасности, и любой, кто @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.tfa4Sh7wcxCEqL29]{Повторяет за экспертом}, получает двойной бонус к своему броску, полученному в результате этой активности.

Успех: Вы избегаете опасности.

Провал: Вы подходите слишком близко к нескольким гейзерам и ошибаетесь в своих движениях. Вы получаете урон [[/r 10d6[fire]]] (спасбросок @Check[type:reflex|dc:36]).

Критический провал: Вы сильно неправильно оцениваете свои движения, и на вас в полную силу обрушивается гейзер. Вы получаете [[/r 20d6[fire]]] урона (спасбросок @Check[type:reflex|dc:36]).

Obscure.name: Obscure
Obscure.description:
Аспект: shadow

Your relic absorbs light and wraps shadow around you, hiding you in darkness. As long as you are in dim light in an area of shadows, you can attempt a Stealth check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide}, even if you aren't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} against the creature, such as with a creature with darkvision.

Organize Labor.name: Organize Labor
Organize Labor.description:
You spend a day in Breachill recruiting workers to aid in a repair or an upgrade at Citadel Altaerein. Attempt a @Check[type:deception|dc:13], @Check[type:diplomacy|dc:13], or @Check[type:intimidation|dc:13] check to Organize Labor to organize workers, or a @Check[type:deception|dc:18], @Check[type:diplomacy|dc:18], or @Check[type:intimidation|dc:18] check for specialists.

If you use Deception or Intimidation for this check, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus, but failure comes with extra risks, as detailed below. Using Diplomacy grants no bonus to the check, but comes without added risk. When you Organize Labor, you must specify one repair or upgrade activity to be undertaken; once you successfully Organize Labor, you must begin that activity within a week.

A force of organized workers costs 1 gp per day, while a force of organized specialists costs 5 gp per day.

Critical Success You organize labor for the full duration of the repair or upgrade activity, and the cost to pay the workers is halved for the duration.

Успех: You organize labor for the full duration of a repair or upgrade activity.

Провал: You organize labor for a single day of a repair or upgrade activity. Unless you used Diplomacy, word of your deceptive or intimidating nature spreads, and you take a -1 circumstance penalty to all future checks to organize labor. This penalty increases with each subsequent failure, to a maximum penalty of -4.

Критический провал: You completely fail to organize labor. If you used Deception or Intimidation, word of your untrustworthiness or cruelty spreads, and you can no longer use that skill to Organize Labor.

Pander to the Crowd.name: Pander to the Crowd
Pander to the Crowd.description:
Requirement This is your first action in a gladiatorial match, or you've damaged or visibly impeded a foe while fighting a gladiatorial match.

With a mocking gesture, a triumphant flourish, or a bold challenge, you inspire the crowd to cheer you on. Attempt an Acrobatics, Athletics, Intimidation, or Performance check, with a DC typically set by the encounter's level. Crowds grow bored with repetition though; and attempting to Pander to the Crowd using the same skill that was used the last time someone used this action imposes a -2 circumstance penalty on the check. If you critically succeeded at an attack roll this turn, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your Pander to the Crowd attempt.

Critical Success The crowd goes wild! You can either give yourself a +3 status bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, saving throws, and skill checks until the end of your next turn, or give yourself and all your allies a +2 status bonus to the same rolls until the end of your next turn.

Успех: You appeal to the crowd. As critical success, but the bonus is +2 just for you, or +1 for you and your allies.

Провал: You don't make an impression.

Критический провал: Your pandering is laughable, and the crowd begins to favor your opponents. The next creature hostile to you that attempts to Pander to the Crowd gains a +4 circumstance bonus to the check.

Perception Filter.name: Perception Filter
Perception Filter.description:
Аспект: mind

Активация: 2 вообразить

Частота: раз в день

Эффект: Your relic reaches into the minds of nearby creatures and blocks your presence from their perceptions. For the next 10 minutes, a creature that enters a @Template[type:emanation|distance:120], centered on you, must attempt a secret @Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)|traits:secret] save, after which the creature is then temporarily immune for 1 day.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes a –2 status penalty to Perception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} or otherwise detect you.

Failure You filter all of the creature's senses, making it difficult for it to notice you. When you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} or undetected from the creature, it doesn't observe you as soon as you do anything other than @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak}, or Step. If it rolls a Perception check to Seek or otherwise detect you, it gets the outcome one degree of success worse than what it rolled, and if you roll a Stealth check to Hide, Sneak, or otherwise escape its attention, you get the outcome one degree of success better than what you rolled against the creature. If you use a hostile action toward the creature, the effect ends for that creature after your hostile action is completed.

Critical Failure As failure, but the effect doesn't end for that creature if you use a hostile action against it.

Perform a Trick.name: Perform a Trick
Perform a Trick.description:
You perform your signature circus trick. Attempt one of the trick checks associated with your trick. The DC for the trick check is determined by your level. The result of each trick check determines whether you generate Excitement, generate Excitement and Anticipation, or lose Excitement.

Critical Success You generate Excitement equal to the trick's level; this Excitement is added to the circus's total Excitement for the show. You also generate Anticipation equal to half the trick's level (rounded up); this Anticipation is added to the circus's total Anticipation for the show.

Успех: You generate Excitement equal to the trick's level; this Excitement is added to the circus's total Excitement for the show.

Провал: No effect.

Критический провал: The circus's Excitement value decreases by a value equal to half the trick's level (rounded up).

You can Perform a Trick multiple times per act, and can choose a different possible trick check for each attempt. If you Perform a Trick twice during the same act, you take a -5 penalty to your second trick check. If you Perform a Trick three times, the penalty for the third check is -10. The penalties are reduced to -4 and -8, respectively, if your trick has the agile trait.

This action always has the circus trait. Starting at 1st level, you can choose one additional trick trait you have access to for your signature trick, and apply it to this action as well. You can add additional traits as your level increases.

Position the Hunters.name: Position the Hunters
Position the Hunters.description:
With the target game animals located, you must move to an advantageous position without startling the prey. Attempt a Stealth check.

  • Against an impressive and dangerous find: @Check[type:stealth|dc:25]
  • Against standard game: @Check[type:stealth|dc:20]
  • Against river turtles, bats, and lesser game: @Check[type:stealth|dc:15]

Critical Success The animals have no indication that they are in danger, and you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to rolls made during the hunting phase.

Успех: You position yourself well and take no penalty when Hunting.

Провал: Your loud and clumsy movements alert the animals to your presence, and you take a -2 circumstance penalty to rolls made during the hunting phase.

Критический провал: You stumble loudly and startle the majority of the animals, which escape and leave the party with very few animals to catch. The party loses 2 IP.

Post Snipers.name: Разместить снайперов
Post Snipers.description:
Охотники Нарлмарша — опытные охотники, но, забрав несколько таких лучников из рядов армии и разместив их в @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{скрытных} местах на крышах или деревьях по всему полю битвы, персонажи смогут максимизировать их потенциал.

Критический успех: Снайперы размещены на нескольких ключевых позициях. В конце хода во время Битвы за Татзлфорд совершите [[/r 1d20+18 #Ranged Strike]]{+18} дистанционный @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Удар} по любой армии, которая не @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.kingmaker-features.Item.2IqM1XHELKwARAx1]. Снайперы наносят 1 очко урона при попадании (2 очка при критическом попадании). Снайперы могут выполнить эту бонусную атаку до 3 раз во время битвы за Татзлфорд, но не более одного раза в конце любого хода.

Успех: Как критический успех, но бонусную атаку снайперы могут выполнить только один раз за бой.

Критический успех: Мало того, что снайперы размещены в районах, которые в конечном итоге оказываются невыгодными, но и ИП выманили из рядов слишком много лучников. Охотники Нарлмарша получают штраф -2 к дистанционным атакам во время битвы за Татзлфорд.

Practical Research.name: Practical Research
Practical Research.description:
Requirement You are a conversant or lore-speaker.

You identify something interesting in the field and perform special research on it. This requires an appropriate check, which the GM will describe when the opportunity arises. The results of the check vary. While they typically include all the benefits of the Study activity, some opportunities for Practical Research also offer unique benefits, such as access to new character options.

Prepare Firepots.name: Подготовить зажигательные горшки
Prepare Firepots.description:
Зная, что в армии есть тролли, подготовка зажигательных горшков, содержащих алхимический огонь, масло или какой-либо вид быстро воспламеняющихся материалов, может иметь неоценимое значение для битвы. Для подготовки огненных котлов требуется проверка Ремесло (обучен).

Критический успех: Создается достаточно горшков, чтобы они были быстро доступны во всех точках поля боя, и в результате армия троллей, атакующая Татзлфорд, теряет тактику "Регенерация".

Успех: Для обеспечения быстрого развёртывания создается недостаточно зажигательных горшков. В конце хода армия троллей должна попытаться выполнить проверку @Check[type:maneuver|dc:20]. При провале, он теряет тактику "Регенерация" до конца своего следующего хода.

Критический провал: Попытка подготовить зажигательные горшки приводит к впечатляющему взрыву, который наносит [[/gmroll 10d6[fire]]] урона персонажу (@Check[type:reflex|dc:25|basic:true]).

Prepare the Processional.name: Prepare the Processional
Prepare the Processional.description:
You spend four days incorporating the following elements into your processional (up to four). Attempt one skill check from the skills listed for each element you choose to incorporate into your processional. The results of these checks determine how many Preparation Points you earn.

Themes: You come up with one theme essential to the processional and determine how to infuse it into every aspect of the celebration. Attempt one of the following skill checks: Lore (if you draw upon knowledge of a thematic topic), Religion (if the theme involves religious inspiration or relies heavily on undead in some way), or Society (if you focus on Geb's history, politics, and zeitgeist).

Exhibits: You work to create or arrange the physical elements of the processional's display, such as statues or icons carried aloft, decorated wagons, extravagant puppetry, trained animals, or the like. Attempt one of the following skill checks: Athletics (if you provide manual labor), Crafting (if you create puppets, chisel statues, or decorate vehicles), or Nature (if you train animals to take part in the processional).

Pageantry: You create the costumes and accessories the participants carry or wear during the processional. Attempt one of the following skill checks: Crafting (if you design the outfits or items to be carried), Deception (if you intend the outfits to be recognizable representations of specific individuals in the form of a disguise), or Performance (if you choreograph dances or compose original music).

Revelers: You recruit a large number of locals to take part in your processional. Attempt one of the following skill checks: Diplomacy (to convince people to join your processional), Intimidation (to threaten them with dire consequences if they don't take part), or Performance (to inspire them to share in your artistic vision).

Critical Success You gain 2 Preparation Points for the party.

Success You gain 1 Preparation Point for the party.

Critical Failure You lose 1 Preparation Point for the party.

Promote the Circus.name: Promote the Circus
Promote the Circus.description:
You spend 2 consecutive days in town generating Anticipation for your next circus show. Attempt a @Check[type:society] check. The DC of this check is equal to the DC appropriate for the group's party level. One other PC can spend 2 downtime days to Aid you, providing a +2 circumstance bonus to your Society check if they succeed at a @Check[type:society|dc:20] check.

Critical Success You generate Anticipation equal to twice the sum of your level plus your Charisma modifier (minimum 2).

Успех: You generate Anticipation equal to your level plus your Charisma modifier (minimum 1).

Провал: You generate 1 Anticipation.

Критический провал: You generate no Anticipation.

Propelling Winds.name: Propelling Winds
Propelling Winds.description:
Аспект: air

Активация: 2 команда, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]

Частота: once per hour

Эффект: The relic casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.A2JfEKe6BZcTG1S8]{Fly} targeting you.

Protector's Interdiction.name: Protector's Interdiction
Protector's Interdiction.description:
Триггер: An adjacent ally is hit or critically hit by an attack

Эффект: You interpose yourself between your ally and the attack. The attack hits you instead, or critically hits you if it critically hit your ally.

Prove Peace.name: Prove Peace
Prove Peace.description:
Требования: You know the conflict that created a specific siege shard, and the siege shard is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized}.

You touch the siege shard, establish a mental connection, and relay facts of the conflict's resolution.

Attempt a check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge} about the conflict that created the shard, using the siege shard's Will DC. If you succeed, you prove the conflict's end, and the siege shard reverts to ordinary stone. On a critical failure, images of the past conflict overwhelm you, and you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} until the end of your next turn.

Raise Ramparts.name: Raise Ramparts
Raise Ramparts.description:
Аспект: earth

Активация: 2 команда, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]

Частота: раз в день

Эффект: Your relic reshapes the earth around you. You cast 5th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.kOa055FIrO9Smnya]{Wall of Stone}.

Rallying Display.name: Rallying Display
Rallying Display.description: You roar or otherwise make a show of bestial strength. You automatically roll a success to rally the crowd to your team.

Reactive Scorch.name: Reactive Scorch
Reactive Scorch.description:
Триггер: A creature Strikes you

Эффект: The creature takes @Damage[2d6[fire]] damage (@Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)|basic:true] save).

Rebuild Battlements.name: Rebuild Battlements
Rebuild Battlements.description:
Требования: Crafting (expert), Specialty Crafting (stonemasonry), or hired stonemason; organized workers

You rebuild and restore the collapsed battlements along the northern section of the central tower. This task takes 28 days of work and a @Check[type:crafting|dc:20] check.

Rebuild Collapsed Stairs.name: Rebuild Collapsed Stairs
Rebuild Collapsed Stairs.description:
Требования: Crafting (expert), Specialty Crafting (stonemasonry), or hired stonemason; organized workers

You work to clear rubble and rebuild the stairs connecting citadel floors, requiring a @Check[type:crafting|dc:20] check. Repairing the stairs from the courtyard to the battlement (connecting areas A12 and A22) takes 4 days. Repairing the stairs from the courtyard to the vault (connecting areas A12 and B1) takes 4 days. Digging out the long flight of stairs down to Alseta's Ring (connecting areas B1 and D7) takes 8 days.

Recruit Wildlife.name: Завербовать животных
Recruit Wildlife.description:
В лесу, окружающем Татзлфорд, обитает немалое количество диких животных. Хотя животные не могут быть организованы в настоящую армию, персонажи всё равно могут попытаться использовать свои навыки, чтобы обратить местную фауну в свою пользу. Для вербовки дикой природы требуется проверка Природы (эксперт). Если у ИП есть @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.d5BFFHXFJYKs5LXr] или он может произносить заклинания типа @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.BBvV7qoXGdw09q1C], он может выбрать чем попытаться выполнить эту проверку, используя Дипломатию (обучен).

Критический успех: ИП интерпретируют реакцию животных на приближение вражеских армий, давая своим армиям бонус обстоятельства +3 к проверкам Инициативы, сделанной во время битвы за Тацлфорд. Кроме того, в один из моментов битвы стая голодных щетинистых тилацинов нападает на армию противника. Эта атака происходит в конце хода, выбранного партией, после чего ИП могут совершить [[/r {1d20+20} #Ближний Удар]]{+20} Удар ближнего боя по любой не @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.kingmaker-features.Item.2IqM1XHELKwARAx1] армии. Тилацины наносят 1 очко урона этой армии при попадании (или 2 очка при критическом попадании), прежде чем животные убегут обратно в лес.

Успех: Как критический успех (включая атаку тилацинов), но бонус обстоятельства на проверки Инициативы равен только +1.

Критиический провал: Мало того, что местные животные отказываются помочь, действия персонажей случайно отправляют в город стайку обезумевших тилацинов для нападения. Городской страже Татзлфорда удается отразить атаку, но они начинают Военное столкновение с 1 очком урона.

Repair Crumbled Walls.name: Repair Crumbled Walls
Repair Crumbled Walls.description:
Требования: Crafting (expert), Specialty Crafting (stonemasonry), or hired stonemason; organized workers

You work to repair a collapsed wall in either the training hall (area A8), the Court of the Nail (area A13), or the records room (area A17). Each room's repair takes 8 days of work and a @Check[type:crafting|dc:20] check.

Repair Huntergate.name: Repair Huntergate
Repair Huntergate.description:
Предварительные условия: trained in Crafting or Thievery

Requirement You have the Huntergate portal key (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.JCGsj7iY88o9uTP5]{Hunter's Arrowhead}).

You use the hunter's arrowhead to guide the misaligned magic of Huntergate back into the proper pathways through the stone's intricate carvings and decorations. You must attempt either a @Check[type:crafting|dc:24] check to Repair (in which case the hunter's arrowhead serves as the repair kit needed for this activity) or a @Check[type:thievery|dc:24] check to Pick a Lock (in which case the hunter's arrowhead serves as the thieves' tools needed for this activity). Regardless of the skill used, the activity takes an hour to perform, and the DC of the check is 24, with the following effects.

Critical Success Huntergate is repaired, and the vision of Dahak hazard inside of the Huntergate way station is reduced in power; reduce all of the hazard's modifiers and DCs by 2.

Успех: Huntergate is repaired.

Провал: Huntergate is not repaired, and the character who attempted the repair becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2} for 1 hour as an orange arc of magical energy lances painfully through their body. A new attempt to repair the portal cannot be made again for 24 hours.

Критический провал: As failure, but the magical backlash also deals [[/r {6d6} [fire]]]{6d6 fire damage} to the character attempting the repairs.

Reposition Chains.name: Reposition Chains
Reposition Chains.description: You pull on the chains, moving a willing chained ally up to 10 feet to a space within your reach.

Repository of Knowledge.name: Repository of Knowledge
Repository of Knowledge.description:
Аспект: mind

Your relic is imbued with the psychic impressions of ages past. While the relic is on your person, you are trained in 3 additional Lore skills of the GM's choice that fit the relic's history, decided at the time of gaining this gift. If the relic is 9th level, you instead have expert proficiency in these Lore skills, and if the relic is 17th level, you have master proficiency in these Lore skills.

Rotate the Wheel.name: Вращать колесо
Rotate the Wheel.description:
Персонажу нужно время, чтобы повернуть колесо. Это утомительно, и в конце раунда ИП должен попытаться выполнить спасбросок @Check[type:fortitude|dc:25]. Сложность этого спасброска увеличивается по мере того, как прогрессируют попытки "Вращать колесо". Совершение полных 7 оборотов приведёт к открытию обеих двойных дверей в этой комнате (они закрываются автоматически через 24 часа).

Критический успех: Критический успех: Колесо делает 2 оборота. КС "Вращать колесо" увеличивается на 1.

Успех: Колесо делает 1 оборот. КС "Вращать колесо" увеличивается на 1.

Провал: Персонажу не удается совершить оборот. КС "Вращать колесо" увеличивается на 2.

Критический успех: Персонаж спотыкается и теряет контроль над рулём, вызывая триггер Опасности @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.kingmaker-bestiary.Actor.FkSxn7QSbVqA3dMy]. Колесо раскручивается, сбрасывая его обороты до 0, а КС до 25.

Searing Wave.name: Searing Wave
Searing Wave.description:
Аспект: fire

Активация: 2 команда, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]

Эффект: You allow a portion of the fire magic housed in your relic to escape in a direction of your choice. You deal @Damage[1d10[fire]] damage for every 2 levels of the relic to all creatures in a @Template[type:cone|distance:30] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)|basic:true]). You can't use Searing Wave again for [[/r 1d4 #Recharge Searing Wave]] rounds.

Seasonal Boon (Close Ties).name: Seasonal Boon (Close Ties)
Seasonal Boon (Close Ties).description:
Частота: only once per season

Триггер: Someone in the party makes an NPC in Willowshore friendly

Эффект: Your reputation precedes you, even if you aren't the one making the attempt to influence an NPC. The NPC is made helpful instead of friendly. Making an NPC helpful can unlock additional support from their location in Willowshore—your GM has more information about this mechanic.

Seasonal Boon (Folklore Enthusiast).name: Seasonal Boon (Folklore Enthusiast)
Seasonal Boon (Folklore Enthusiast).description:
Частота: only once per season

Триггер: You're about to roll any check to Recall Knowledge

Эффект: You have a flash of insight as you recall an old parable, obscure legend, or applicable tale to the topic at hand. This Recall Knowledge check loses the secret trait. Increase the result of your check to Recall Knowledge by one degree of success.

Seasonal Boon (Northridge Scholar).name: Seasonal Boon (Northridge Scholar)
Seasonal Boon (Northridge Scholar).description:
Частота: only once per season

Триггер: The party's reputation with Northridge increases

Эффект: Increase the party's reputation with Northridge by an additional 2 points (your GM has information about Willowshore reputation).

Seasonal Boon (Outskirt Dweller).name: Seasonal Boon (Outskirt Dweller)
Seasonal Boon (Outskirt Dweller).description:
Частота: only once per season

Триггер: You're about to roll initiative

Эффект: Something about the situation triggers your defenses, allowing you to react to sudden peril more quickly. You gain a status bonus to your initiative roll equal to the number of seasons since you've started Season of Ghosts (+1 during the first adventure, up to a maximum of +4 during the fourth and final adventure). If you can communicate a warning to other PCs, they gain this bonus to their initiative as well.

Seasonal Boon (Southbank Traditionalist).name: Seasonal Boon (Southbank Traditionalist)
Seasonal Boon (Southbank Traditionalist).description:
Частота: only once per season

Триггер: The party's reputation with Southbank increases

Эффект: Increase the party's reputation with Southbank by an additional 2 points (your GM has information about Willowshore reputation).

Seasonal Boon (Willowshore Urchin).name: Seasonal Boon (Willowshore Urchin)
Seasonal Boon (Willowshore Urchin).description:
Частота: only once per season

Триггер: You (or an adjacent PC) are about to roll a recovery check

Эффект: You gain an automatic critical success on the recovery check rather than rolling it as your hearty physique, tenacious attitude, or just plain old luck continues to help you survive the way it had during your childhood. If you're adjacent to a PC who's about to roll a recovery check, you can instead use this boon to grant them this effect.

Set Traps.name: Установить ловушки
Set Traps.description:
Установив несколько быстро сооружаемых ловушек в окрестных лесах или узких переулках, персонажи могут затруднить движение нападающих и даже ранить некоторых из них. Для установки ловушек требуется проверка Выживания (обучен).

Критический успех: В конце каждого хода во время Битвы за Татзлфорд одна вражеская армия по выбору игроков @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.kingmaker-features.Item.oVhkdym3D6TiTbrN] 1 и получает 1 очко урона.

Успех: В конце каждого хода во время Битвы за Татзлфорд одна вражеская армия по выбору игроков @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.kingmaker-features.Item.oVhkdym3D6TiTbrN] 1 или получает 1 очко урона.

Критический провал: Попытка установить ловушки не только терпит неудачу, но и одна из них дает эффектную осечку во время размещения: попытка установить бревно, покрытое шипами, терпит неудачу, в результате чего персонаж разбивается о стену здания. Этот ИП получает [[/gmroll 5d6[bludgeoning],5d6[piercing]]] урона (@Check[type:reflex|dc:25|basic:true]).

Shadow Smith.name: Shadow Smith
Shadow Smith.description:
Аспект: shadow

Активация: 1 Interact

Эффект: Your relic pulls at nearby shadows, twisting them into the shape of a simple weapon or a simple tool or item, such as a rope or crowbar. It lasts until it is used for a single activity, until you use shadow smith again, or for 1 minute, whichever comes first, after which it dissipates.

Shattered Earth.name: Shattered Earth
Shattered Earth.description:
Аспект: earth

Активация: 2 команда, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]

Частота: once per hour

Эффект: Seismic pulses from your relic ripple through the nearby ground, shaking sharp fragments to the surface. A 10-foot-radius patch of stone or earth within 60 feet is transformed into difficult terrain. A creature that enters an affected square during a move action must succeed at an Acrobatics check or Reflex save or take @Damage[1d6[piercing]] damage; it needs to roll only once per move action even if it moves through several squares. At 6th level and every 4 levels thereafter, increase the damage by [[/r 1d6]].

Shed Time.name: Разорвать время
Shed Time.description:
Триггер: Вы проваливаете или критически проваливаете спасбросок, по вам попадают Ударом или увеличиваете значение состояния @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{При смерти}.

Требования: Вы находитесь в Доме на краю времени (включая любую из басен Нириссы) и в данный момент находитесь под защитой Теоремы спирали. Вы разрываете временную шкалу, которую занимаете в данный момент, а затем возвращаетесь к ней, как только пройдет спровоцировавшее событие. Точные эффекты зависят от характера триггера, как подробно описано ниже. Вы больше не защищены Теоремой спирали; как только эта защита будет потеряна, её невозможно будет восстановить.

  • Провал спасброска: Измените степень успеха с Провала на Успех или с Критического провала на Провал, для спровоцировавшего спасброска.
  • Попадание Удара. Если спровоцировавший @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Удар} был критическим успехом, измените его на успех. Если спровоцировавший Удар был успешным, измените его на провал.
  • Увеличение состояния При смерти:. Вместо того, чтобы увеличить своё состояние @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{При смерти}, вы теряете состояние При смерти.

Soul Ward.name: Soul Ward
Soul Ward.description:
Частота: once

Триггер: You would gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} or dying condition, or you would be destroyed

Эффект: You regain [[/r 200[healing]]]{200 Hit Points}, up to your maximum Hit Points. All resistances and temporary Hit Points granted to you by Geb immediately end.

Steal Luck.name: Steal Luck
Steal Luck.description:
Аспект: luck

Активация: r вообразить

Частота: раз в день

Триггер: You or a creature within 30 feet of you rolls two d20s for a fortune or misfortune effect and you like the higher roll

Эффект: You steal the higher of the two numbers the triggering target rolled; the target must use the other result. Until you make your next daily preparations, you can substitute that number for one d20 roll made for a saving throw or skill check you have to make against an effect created by an enemy, hazard, or the environment. Doing so is a fortune effect. If you fail to do so before your next daily preparations, you lose the stored number.

Underground Bounty.name: Underground Bounty
Underground Bounty.description:
Аспект: earth

Your relic produces metals and stones to empower your weapons. Each day during your daily preparations, your relic conjures a magical shard of silver, cold iron, gold, or a non-precious stone or metal material of your choice (such as bronze or granite). If your relic is a weapon, it immediately absorbs the shard, causing it to gain a magical sheen of that metal or stone until your next daily preparations. If your relic is not a weapon, the shard is not immediately used, and you can touch it to a stone or metal weapon using an Interact action to give it a magical sheen of that metal or stone for 10 minutes. While coated in the magical sheen, the weapon interacts with weaknesses, resistances, and the like as if it were made of the stone or metal from the shard rather than its own. The sheen and the shard are obviously magical in nature, and if you don't use the shard, it disappears when you make your next daily preparations. At 17th level, add adamantine and mithral to the available options.

Uniter of Clans Enhancement.name: Uniter of Clans Enhancement
Uniter of Clans Enhancement.description: Increase the diplomat's badge's item bonus to Diplomacy to +2 for the Uniter of Clans.

Word of Faith.name: Word of Faith
Word of Faith.description:
Аспект: celestial

Активация: 2 команда, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]

Частота: once per hour

Эффект: Placing your hand on yourself or an ally, you heal their wounds and bolster their spirit. The target regains[[/r 1d8[healing]]] HP per item level and reduces their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} value by 1.

Wrestle.name: Wrestle
Wrestle.description: You make a claw Strike against a creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} or otherwise @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} by you. If you hit, you deal damage as usual and that creature is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.
